definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[וְיִתַּר מִמְּקוֹמוֹ]] Job 37:1 yea, it (the heart) starts up from its place (‖[[יֶחֱרַד]]).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Inf. [[לְנַתֵּר בָּהֵן עַל־הָאָרֶץ]] Le 11:21 (P), to leap with them (i.e. its legs) upon the earth (of locust).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיַּתֵּר גּוֹיִם]] Hb Hab 3:6 he (´[[י]]) looked, and made nations start up.
